name: bass-clarinet
description: SAX based evented streaming JSON parser in Typescript (browser and node)
author: corno

scripts.buildLintAndTest: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && npm run buildLintAndTest
scripts.pubMin: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: tsc && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha dist/test/testTestSets.js && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha dist/test/JSONTestSuite.js && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha dist/test/testNormalize.js
scripts.update2latestAndPublishMinor: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm run update2latest && npm run test && git commit -am "u2l" && npm run pubMin
scripts.update2latestAndPublishPath: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm run update2latest && npm run test && git commit -am "u2l" && npm run pubPatch
